items.sentence: I think that this photo was taken in October.
I think that Tom is about the same age as me.
I think Tom is in the kitchen washing dishes.
I think Tom is a much better driver than you.
I know that you'll find happiness eventually.
I know that you don't want to disappoint Tom.
I know that Tom will be permitted to do that.
I know that Tom might not be able to do that.
I know that Tom isn't going to do that today.
I know that Tom isn't a very outgoing person.
